title: Pod security policy enforcement not defined.
description:
Rule ID: GCP009
Resource 'google_container_cluster.k8s_cluster' defines a cluster with no Pod Security Policy config defined. It is recommended to define a PSP for your pods and enable PSP enforcement.
mitigation: Use security policies for pods to restrict permissions to those needed to be effective
impact: Pods could be operating with more permissions than required to be effective

title: Shielded GKE nodes not enabled.
description:
Rule ID: GCP010
Resource 'google_container_cluster.k8s_cluster' defines a cluster with shielded nodes disabled. Shielded GKE Nodes provide strong, verifiable node identity and integrity to increase the security of GKE nodes and should be enabled on all GKE clusters.
impact: Node identity and integrity can't be verified without shielded GKE nodes

title: Potentially sensitive data stored in block attribute.
description:
Rule ID: GEN003
Block 'keycloak_oidc_identity_provider.google' includes a potentially sensitive attribute which is defined within the project.
mitigation: Don't include sensitive data in blocks
impact: Block attribute could be leaking secrets
